segments.text: One of my students told me she was very depressed today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she ’ s broken up about it , poor kid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I talked to her for a while , but she ’ s really depressed . So , I made an appointment with the school counselor for her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . The counselor is a psychologist . He ’ s better trained to handle these sorts of things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that ’ s what I told her . I ’ m glad she ’ s reaching out for help , instead of trying to deal with this on her own .
segments.speaker: S1
